description: Mobile techniques used by FakeSpy, ATT&CK software S0509 v1.0
name: FakeSpy (S0509)

techniques.comment: [FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can collect the device’s contact list.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can collect account information stored on the device, as well as data in external storage.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can collect a list of installed applications.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can register for the `BOOT_COMPLETED` broadcast Intent.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can collect SMS messages.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) is spread via direct download links in SMS phishing messages.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can detect if it is running in an emulator and adjust its behavior accordingly.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) masquerades as local postal service applications.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can collect the device’s network information.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)

[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) stores its malicious code in encrypted asset files that are decrypted at runtime. Newer versions of [FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) encrypt the C2 address.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can send SMS messages.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) exfiltrates data using HTTP requests.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can hide its icon if it detects that it is being run on an emulator.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can collect device information, including OS version and device model.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
[FakeSpy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0509) can collect device networking information, including phone number, IMEI, and IMSI.(Citation: Cybereason FakeSpy)
